item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-06-21
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• RT: We added profiles, lists, and contacts! Organizing and sharing series is even easier. (via @fictfact) #
  • I'm at Whole Foods Market (950 Providence Highway, at 300 Legacy Place, Dedham) w/ 3 others. #
  • I'm at Tango Mango Taqueria (1191 Centre St, Newton). #

Powered by Twitter Tools
